info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:54PM EDT until May 16 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... Northeastern Columbia County in east central New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Austerlitz, or 8 miles east of Chatham, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, North Adams, Adams, Williamstown, Lenox, Cheshire, New Lebanon, Austerlitz, Florida, Hancock, Savoy, New Ashford, Berkshire, Dalton, Lanesborough, Canaan, Richmond, West Stockbridge, Windsor and Hairpin Turn. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
